h2_title: Where to Find The Monk from the Sea
content: From the Temple Entrance Shrine, take the far right path and head up a narrow sloping path filled with Supporter Monks to find a side area, and continue through the large gate past where Censor Holders are praying, and the monk will jump out of an altar as you enter the next large open part of the temple grounds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Monk_from_the_Sea.md', within the main section titled 'Monk from the Sea', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Monk from the Sea'.
The content is as follows:
From the Temple Entrance Shrine, take the far right path and head up a narrow sloping path filled with Supporter Monks to find a side area, and continue through the large gate past where Censor Holders are praying, and the monk will jump out of an altar as you enter the next large open part of the temple grounds.
